Row.Text: Physics-based map generation with plate tectonics, realistic climate, and diverse terrain. Mountains follow convergent boundaries, rift valleys form at divergent zones, and atmospheric pressure shapes rainfall patterns.
Temperate climate variant with milder weather patterns and reduced extremes. Same physics-based generation with adjusted climate parameters for a more moderate world.
